  • interest_owed_per_day – A list of interest owed per day for each loan

class defi_sdk_py.helper_core.HelperCore[source]

Bases: object

HelperCore provides utility functions to assist with loan and collateral calculations.

calculate_borrow_amount(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, borrow_amount: int, borrow_token: IERC20Metadata, collateral_sent_amount: int, collateral_token: IERC20Metadata, ltv: int) → BorrowAmountInfo[source]

Calculates the maximum amount that can be borrowed and the corresponding collateral amount required based on a specified LTV ratio.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • borrow_amount – The amount intended to borrow

  • borrow_token – The token metadata of the borrowing token

  • collateral_sent_amount – The amount of collateral provided

  • collateral_token – The token metadata of the collateral token

  • ltv – The desired LTV ratio for the loan

Returns:

A BorrowAmountInfo object containing the calculated maximum borrow amount and collateral amount

calculate_ltv_for_adjust_collateral(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, adjust_amount: int, is_add: bool) → int[source]

Calculates the LTV ratio for a loan after adjusting the collateral by a specific amount.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • adjust_amount – The amount by which the collateral is being adjusted

  • is_add – A boolean indicating whether the collateral is being added (True) or removed (False)

Returns:

The calculated LTV ratio after the collateral adjustment

calculate_ltv_for_borrow(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, borrow_amount: int, borrow_token: IERC20Metadata, collateral_amount: int, collateral_token: IERC20Metadata) → int[source]

Calculates the loan-to-value (LTV) ratio for a loan when borrowing a specific amount.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • borrow_amount – The amount intended to borrow

  • borrow_token – The token metadata of the borrowing token

  • collateral_amount – The amount of collateral provided

  • collateral_token – The token metadata of the collateral token

Returns:

The calculated LTV ratio for the proposed borrow scenario

calculate_ltv_for_repay(nft_id: int, loan_id: int, repay_amount: int, is_only_interest: bool) → int[source]

Calculates the LTV ratio for a loan after repaying a specific amount.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the loan

  • loan_id – The loan ID

  • repay_amount – The amount intended to repay

  • is_only_interest – A boolean indicating whether only the interest is being repaid

Returns:

The calculated LTV ratio after the repayment
